  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client(String ip, int port, int chosenView) throws IOException
      Establish a connection between the selected server using Java Socket
      Parameters:
      ip - the server IP
      port - the server port
      chosenView - is 0 if the user selected CLI, 1 if he selected GUI
      Throws:
      IOException - if the connection failed

      This method continuously takes the incoming server events from the queue and raises them through the GameHandler
